abstract: One task facing James E. Staley, the new head of investment banking at JPMorgan Chase, will be to heal rifts between the London and New York offices, The Wall Street Journal reported.
snippet: One task facing James E. Staley, the new head of investment banking at JPMorgan Chase, will be to heal rifts between the London and New York offices, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: One the tasks facing James E. Staley, who was named head of investment banking at JPMorgan Chase on Tuesday, will be to heal rifts between the bank’s London and New York offices, The Wall Street Journal reported.

headline.main: JPMorgan’s Staley Must Heal British-U.S. Rift, Report Says
